title: Brand: Wiha / Part #: 28348
body_html:
Item #: 32817496
Brand: Wiha
Model #: 28348

Product Specifications

Set Type 12 Piece Insulated Slimline Blade Belt Set
Tip Type Slotted; Torx; Hex; Phillips
Container Type Plastic Holder
Drive Size 4.0 mm
Insulated Yes
Includes Wiha 28335 - Insulated SlimLine Blade Hex 3.0mm (OAL 3?); Wiha 28342 - Insulated SlimLine Blade Torx T20 (OAL 3?); Wiha 28314 - Belt Clip for Set #28313; Wiha 28343 - Insulated SlimLine Blade Torx T25 (OAL 3?); Wiha 28312 - Insulated SlimLine Blade Slotted 5.5mm (OAL 3?); Wiha 28346 - Insulated SlimLine Blade Square #1 (OAL 3?); Wiha 28319 - Insulated SlimLine Blade Phillips #2 (OAL 3?); Wiha 28341 - Insulated SlimLine Blade Torx T15 (OAL 3?); Wiha 28317 - Insulated SlimLine Blade Phillips #1 (OAL 3?); Wiha 28309 - Insulated SlimLine Blade Slotted 4.0mm (OAL 3?); Wiha 28334 - Insulated SlimLine Blade Hex 2.5mm (OAL 3?); Wiha 28336 - Insulated SlimLine Blade Hex 4.0mm (OAL 3?); Wiha 28347 - Insulated SlimLine Square Blade #2 (OAL 3?)
Number Of Pieces 12
Features 4.0mm slim diameter; Chrome-vanadium-molybdenum steel, through-hardened, titanium silver; Very slim blade diameter for hard to reach screws; Individually tested to 10,000 volts AC and rated to 1,000 volts AC for safety and peace of mind; Made in Germany
Length (Inch) 5-1/2 in
